snippet.title: Mini Minny e a Magia Perdida! - Trailer | #GlobalGameJam2021 #SBGames2021
snippet.description:
In a magical world, 
not too unlike ours, 
a wacky little witch,
plays with her powers!

Using her mom’s cauldron,
she tries to brew a potion,
but something goes wrong,
and she causes an explosion!

Now she’s on a mission,
to find all that’s been lost,
and to bring back the magic,
no matter the cost!

Find all of the items and clean up the mess before your mom gets home! Do you think you have what it takes to find it all in time?
Bring back the magic in Mini Minny and the Missing Magic!

LINK DOWNLOAD: https://maduvenancio.itch.io/mini-minny

Developed in under 48 hours during the 2021 Global Game Jam with the theme “Lost and Found”.
